title: My page I am on will really slow down, a yellow band comes accross the top and says another web page is slowing me down and would I like to stop it. I press stop, my page speeds up and then it happens again
creator: carolynmerrill

title: yahoo mail account Frontier ISP
content:
my yahoo mail account is not optimized for firefox! help I hate chrome and safari

I was told that Yahoo does not optimize (I'm talking out of my hat here) for Firefox.

I do not want to use chrome or safari.

I LOVE firefox.

Apart from having to get a whole new email address which means changing everything! does anyone have any suggestions.

In other words I cannot get my Frontier account Yahoo mail on my new iMac.
creator: kiuppa

title: firefox is not running on Windows 10 , require only compatible mode
content:
The mozilla firefox stop working suddenly on Windows 10, i tried almost everything and i was not being able to fix it. What i did isÂ :

1. Started firefox in safe mode 2. Uninstalled compeletely firefox and then tried to install it, on end of installation was getting the error the application was unable to start correctly (0xc000000d) 3. checked about:crashes is not possible because only allow you to write and nothing else happens if you press enter stays as it is

Somehow firefox installed and i am only able to start it on compatible mode, how can i fix the problem and see what it happens?

Running in compatible mode breaks the visual on full screen also.
creator: reffertzy_a109f
